title: People in Silver/Gold don't know how to finish games
body: It's the biggest flaw I've noticed about this ELO. Most of the games I'm playing are going for way longer on average now (45 min+) and often results in throws. People need to learn that turrets and objectives win games, not getting a kill and then backing to base. On the plus side I'm consistently getting S+ with the new rating system so I'm obviously playing well, but still losing games. Which just proves the fact that solo queue is just luck of the draw and I'm going to have to accept that
